_Split Ingredients Into Their Own Row_
```{r}
indian_food<-indian_food%>%
  mutate_all(tolower)%>%
  transform(ingredients=str_split(ingredients,","))%>%
  unnest(ingredients)
indian_food

```

```{r}
indian_food%>%
  group_by(ingredients)%>%
  summarise(n_recipes=n_distinct(name))
```
```{r}
indian_food%>%
  group_by(name)%>%
  summarise(max_prep_time=max(prep_time))%>%
  arrange(desc(max_prep_time))
```
